jdbcService.sql: select * from ~nodes n join ~contexts c on n.id = c.id -- we are interested in user realms! join ~master_data_entries mde on mde.id = c.context_type_id and mde.name = 'realm' join ~group_roles gr on gr.node_id = n.id join ~actions a on gr.role_id = ar.role_id join ~action_roles ar on ar.action_id = a.id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id where a.name = 'user.manage' and ug.user_id = any(:userIds)
